author: Vladimir Isachenkov | AP
title: Russian foreign minister calls for unity in fighting virus
description: Russia's foreign minister has angrily rejected Western claims that Moscow is using the coronavirus crisis to expand its political influence
content:
Russia sent military medics and disinfection experts to Italy as virus infections and deaths surged there last month. A similar Russian team was later dispatched to Serbia.
During a conference call with reporters, Lavrov dismissed Western claims that the Kre… [+2489 chars]
